biotools.summary: This package provides an efficient data pre-processing tool designed to reduce background noise and improve signal for DNA methylation estimation from Illumina Methylation BeadChip array measurements. It is a model based background correction method that can significantly improve accuracy and reproducibility of methylation measures.

bioschemas.name: ENmix
bioschemas.summary: This package provides an efficient data pre-processing tool designed to reduce background noise and improve signal for DNA methylation estimation from Illumina Methylation BeadChip array measurements. It is a model based background correction method that can significantly improve accuracy and reproducibility of methylation measures.
